labels.label: Generate realtime views and store most actual
Generate batch views and store them

entry.value: CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS default.weather (city_name STRING, country STRING, latitude FLOAT, longitude FLOAT, last_updated_date STRING, temperature FLOAT, is_day INT, wind_speed FLOAT, wind_degree FLOAT, wind_direction STRING, pressure_mb FLOAT, precipitation_mm FLOAT, humidity FLOAT, cloud FLOAT, feelslike_temperature FLOAT, visibility_km FLOAT) Partitioned By(partition_dt STRING) STORED AS PARQUET Location '${absolute.hdfs.path:substringBeforeLast('/')}'; MSCK Repair Table default.weather;

processors.name: Add Partition field into the content
Batch records to one parquet file

processors.name: Batch records to one parquet file

entry.value: CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS default.air_pollution (latitude FLOAT, longitude FLOAT, aqi INT, co FLOAT, no FLOAT, no2 FLOAT, o3 FLOAT, so2 FLOAT, pm2_5 FLOAT, pm10 FLOAT, nh3 FLOAT, measurement_time BIGINT) Partitioned By(partition_dt STRING) STORED AS PARQUET Location '${absolute.hdfs.path:substringBeforeLast('/')}'; MSCK Repair Table default.air_pollution;
